snippet: Caste, religion, corruption and economic inequality all issues in Uttar Pradesh elections.
abstract: Caste, religion, corruption and economic inequality all issues in Uttar Pradesh elections.
lead_paragraph: Uttar Pradesh is "India's biggest political prize and, with elections this month, its biggest political unknown," Jim Yardley writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: U.P. Elections, Window on India's Politics
